entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 11:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming west 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
